basics.name: Puneeth Chaganti
basics.summary: Puneeth hails from Hyderabad, India. FIXME ?!?!!!
basics.label: Programmer

highlights: Learnt about and experimented with Convolutional Neural Networks for image based tasks.
Built a system to search for similar fashion items from a database of products using Neural hash codes of images and fashion attributes.
Improved the data collection platform to aggregate data into the fashion database.

work.summary: Helped build a Qt (PySide) based development environment for Scientists/Engineers.  Also helped develop the initial design and build the first cut of an application deployment platform for Python based apps.  Gained some taste for good design, while working here.
Designed and developed material & helped conduct workshops to train college level teachers and students in using Python for Scientific Computing.

Recurse Center is a collaborative, self-directed, 12-week programming retreat. I spent my time getting more familiar with functional programming, the internals of Python, and building things using embedded hardware.
